mapper.select:
SELECT
,
FROM CMS_CONTENT C where C.ContentID = #{contentID,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND C.IsDelete = 0

select ,
from CMS_CONTENT C join CMS_CHANNEL L on C.ChannelID = L.ChannelID and C.IsDelete = 0 and L.IsDelete = 0 and L.ChannelPath = #{channelPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} join CMS_SITE S on S.SiteID = L.SiteID and S.IsDelete = 0 and S.SiteCode = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by C.UpdateTime desc limit 0, 1

select count(*) from CMS_CONTENT C left join (select L.ChannelID, L.ChannelName, R.ContentID from CMS_CHANNEL_CONTENT R inner join CMS_CHANNEL L on R.ChannelID = L.ChannelID and L.IsDelete = '0') L on L.ContentID = C.ContentID and C.IsDelete = 0

select
, L.ChannelName as channelName, L.ChannelID as channelID from CMS_CONTENT C inner join CMS_CHANNEL L on R.ChannelID = L.ChannelID and L.IsDelete = '0' on L.ChannelID = C.ChannelID and C.IsDelete = 0 order by L.ChannelID asc, C.UpdateTime desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
select count(C.ContentID) from CMS_CONTENT C join CMS_CHANNEL L on C.ChannelID = L.ChannelID and L.IsDelete = 0 and L.ChannelID in #{item}

select
from CMS_CONTENT C where
C.ContentTitle like concat('%',${contentTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and
C.CreateUser = ${createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
C.IsDelete = 0 order by UpdateTime desc

select
,
from CMS_CONTENT C where C.IsDelete = 0 and C.ChannelID = #{channelID} order by C.Sequence limit 0, 1
select Max(Sequence) from CONTENT C WHERE C.IsDelete = 0
